title: SG Skins Release Date?
body: Ok so obviously they'll be released in 6.20, and obviously that'll be on a late tuesday night/early wednesday morning, but is it next week or 2 weeks from now?

replies.body: I don't have any information on new content, I'm afraid!  Stay up to date on our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page for anything coming up.  Hang in there!
